parsed_json.name: Pushups
parsed_json.summary: One of the most fundamental bodyweight exercises
parsed_json.start_position: Lying face down on the floor, palms flat on the floor, arms straight

steps.step: Tilt pelvis backward and squeeze butt tight
Place your wrist in a nearly vertical line under your shoulder when doing the standard pushup
Go all the way up and all the way down and let your body straight
When going down, shoulder blades come together and when going up, they go apart. Push them downward instead of upward
